RTCPeerConnectionConnectionState.summary: The connectionState read-only property of the interface indicates the current state of the peer connection by returning one of the following string values: new, connecting, connected, disconnected, failed, or closed.

remarks.para: This state essentially represents the aggregate state of all ICE transports (which are of type or ) being used by the connection.
When this property's value changes, a event is sent to the instance.

RTCPeerConnectionConnectionState.value:
A string representing the current state of the connection.
